title: Keegan’s In, Lachlan’s Out: Pro Riders React to Life Time Grand Prix Series Changes and Updates
content:
The 2025 Grand Prix will see smaller fields, less races at altitude, and more mountain biking. What do riders like Lauren De Crescenzo, Haley Smith, Keegan Swenson, and Alexey Vermeulen think?

Read the full article at Keegan’s In, Lachlan’s Out: Pro Riders React to Life Time Grand Prix Series Changes and Updates on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
